item.title: [unf] The Space Family Goblinson
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Guest

The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.

Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

item.title: [unf] Temple Garden
item.description:
Land — Forest Plains

({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [unf] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.title: [unf] Wizards of the _____
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard Performer

When this creature enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it, then look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of unique vowels on that sticker. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (The vowels are A, E, I, O, U, and Y.)

item.title: [unf] Wicker Picker
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Scarecrow Guest

Creature spells you cast have sticker kicker {1}. (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast a creature spell. If you do, you get {TIX}, then you may put a sticker on it.)

item.title: [unf] Watery Grave
item.description:
Land — Island Swamp

({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)

As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [unf] Attempted Murder
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose target creature. Roll X six-sided dice. For each even result, put two -1/-1 counters on that creature. For each odd result, create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying named Storm Crow.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sYRYw6fVBe8

item.title: [unf] Devil K. Nevil
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Devil Performer

Haste

When Devil K. Nevil enters the battlefield, jump it over any number of creatures. If it clears those creatures, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. (You can see a jumping demonstration at DevilKNevil.com.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=48_HnnUD0KA

item.title: [unf] Centaur of Attention
item.description:
Creature — Centaur Performer

When Centaur of Attention enters the battlefield, roll five six-sided dice and store those results on it.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may reroll any number of Centaur of Attention's stored results.

Centaur of Attention gets +X/+X, where X is the greatest number of stored results on it for the same value.

https://twitter.com/CoreyBaumeister/status/1572329759106736128

item.title: [unf] Bar Entry
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

• Destroy target creature with any part of its head higher than the bar. (Align the tops of both cards to check.)

item.title: [unf] How Is This a Par Three?!
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast a spell, you may have target player mill X cards, where X is the number of words in the spell's name.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTx4jFZr-78

item.title: [unf] Exchange of Words
item.description:
Enchantment

When Exchange of Words enters the battlefield, choose two target creatures. For as long as Exchange of Words remains on the battlefield, exchange the text boxes of those creatures.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTx4jFZr-78

item.title: [unf] Foam Weapons Kiosk
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. That creature gains vigilance until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/wizards_magicES/status/1572360718770638848

item.description:

item.title: [unf] D00-DL, Caricaturist
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Robot

When D00-DL, Caricaturist enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 colorless Sketch creature token, which you have fifteen seconds to draw. The token has flying if it has wings in its art. The same is true for first strike and a sword, vigilance and a shield, menace and mean eyes, trample and horns, deathtouch and claws, lifelink and fangs, and haste and footwear.

item.title: [unf] Costume Shop
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — You may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

https://twitter.com/ZBexx/status/1572430870488961024

item.title: [unf] Get Your Head in the Game
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

When Get Your Head in the Game enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent until it (this card) leaves the battlefield, then touch it (this card) with your head. When it (this card) stops touching it (your head), sacrifice it (the card, not your head).

item.title: [sld] Pyrite Spellbomb
item.description:
Artifact

{R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: It deals 2 damage to any target.

{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.

item.title: [unf] Space Beleren
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Jace

Space sculptor (Space Beleren divides the battlefield into alpha, beta, and gamma sectors. If a creature isn't assigned to a sector, its controller assigns it to one. Opponents assign first.)

+1: Creatures in each sector can be blocked this turn only by creatures in the same sector.

−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature in the sector of your choice.

−5: Destroy all creatures in the sector of your choice.

https://twitter.com/Sci_Phile/status/1572232372011307010

item.title: [unf] Space Beleren
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Jace

Space sculptor (Space Beleren divides the battlefield into alpha, beta, and gamma sectors. If a creature isn't assigned to a sector, its controller assigns it to one. Opponents assign first.)

+1: Creatures in each sector can be blocked this turn only by creatures in the same sector.

−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature in the sector of your choice.

−5: Destroy all creatures in the sector of your choice.

item.title: [unf] Juggletron
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot

Trample

Whenever Juggletron attacks, you may put an art sticker on it.

Juggletron gets +3/+0 for each item in its art that's not touching Juggletron, another item, or the card frame.

https://twitter.com/Dia_Planinauta/status/1572243123648200704

item.title: [unf] Myra the Magnificent
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Performer

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, open an Attraction.

{X}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from your graveyard and choose an Attraction you control that doesn't have a midway counter on it. Put a midway counter on it. Whenever you visit that attraction, copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-1-2022-09-20

item.title: [unf] Vorthos, Steward of Myth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Gamer

As Vorthos, Steward of Myth enters the battlefield, choose a named Magic character.

Each spell you cast with the chosen character in its name, flavor text, or art costs {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-1-2022-09-20

item.title: [unf] The Superlatorium (A)
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent chooses "the fastest," "the scariest," or "the weakest." You choose a creature, then ask a person outside the game to choose the creature that best fits the chosen criteria. If they choose the same creature you chose, claim the prize!

Prize — Create two 1/1 red Balloon creature tokens with flying, then sacrifice The Superlatorium and open an Attraction.

Hit: 2 3 6

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-1-2022-09-20

item.title: [unf] The Superlatorium (B)
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent chooses "the cutest," "the loudest," or "the strongest." You choose a creature, then ask a person outside the game to choose the creature that best fits the chosen criteria. If they choose the same creature you chose, claim the prize!

Prize — Create two 1/1 red Balloon creature tokens with flying, then sacrifice The Superlatorium and open an Attraction.

Hit: 2 4 6

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-1-2022-09-20

item.description:

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color that appears on your top. (A top is an outerwear garment worn on the upper body.)

item.title: [40k] Sanguinary Priest
item.description:
Creature — Astartes Cleric

Lifelink

Blood Chalice — Whenever another creature you control dies, Sanguinary Priest deals 1 damage to any target.

https://www.ign.com/articles/see-a-new-card-from-the-magic-the-gathering-and-warhammer-40000-crossover

item.title: [40k] Commissar Severina Raine
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Leading from the Front — Whenever Commissar Severina Raine attacks, each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of other attacking creatures.

Summary Execution — {2}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

https://twitter.com/WarComTeam/status/1570782118128533510

item.title: [40k] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [40k] Beacon of Unrest
item.description:
Sorcery

Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

item.title: [40k] Desert of the Glorified
item.description:
Land — Desert

Desert of the Glorified enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B}.

Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [40k] Go for the Throat
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target nonartifact creature.

item.title: [40k] Hedron Archive
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

item.title: [40k] Mask of Memory
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard a card.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.description:
Land

Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B}.

item.title: [40k] Myriad Landscape
item.description:
Land

Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
